title: 147: 'Sall Good
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Magbee worries that A.J. is a little too fascinated with evil, so A.J. leaned into it and investigated how we currently think of evil. We follow the train of thought from Augustine to Aquinas. Turns out everything is pretty great.
itunes:author: A good one, a solid one, and a great one
itunes:subtitle: And not at all bad
itunes:summary: Magbee worries that A.J. is a little too fascinated with evil, so A.J. leaned into it and investigated how we currently think of evil. We follow the train of thought from Augustine to Aquinas. Turns out everything is pretty great.
